event1.heading: System Administrator, Internship
event1.description: During this internship, I am building a CRM system with a customer's portal for Linkbox using EspoCRM. I am using PHP hooks and creating or changing entities, fields, and relationships to meet the company's needs.

event2.heading: Global Business Engineering, VIA
event2.description: Durning my education, I have learned much about software engineering. I have learned about programming languages such as Java, C#, Python, and JavaScript. I have also learned about databases, web development, and software architecture.

event3.heading: CMS Developer, Internship
event3.description: During my internship, I developed websites using WordPress and Elementor, and managed SEO and link-building strategies for existing clients.

event4.heading: Marketing Management, EASV
event4.description: Focused on digital marketing, social media management, and content creation. Developed skills in SEO, SEM, link building and analytics.
